tijos.framework.devicecenter

Class TiSPIMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiSPIMaster

  • public class TiSPIMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    The TiSPIMaster for devicecenter of framework.
    Author:
    Andy.

      • open

        public static TiSPIMaster open(int portID)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open the TiSPIMaster port by port id, and return the object
        NOTE: remapID is 0, that is default location
        Parameters:
        portID - port id
        Returns:
        TiSPIMaster object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs

      • openRemap

        public static TiSPIMaster openRemap(int portID,
                                    int remapID)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Open the TiSPIMaster port by port id and remap id, and return the object
        Parameters:
        portID - port id
        remapID - the remap Id, range:0-3
        Returns:
        TiSPIMaster object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs

      • read

        public int read(byte[] data,
                int offset,
                int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Read the data from salve
        Parameters:
        data - data array
        offset - data offset
        len - data length
        Returns:
        read length
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If data is null

      • selectSlave

        public void selectSlave(boolean enable)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Select the slave or not
        Parameters:
        enable - true - select slave, false - release slave
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs

      • setWorkParameters

        public void setWorkParameters(int mode,
                              int type,
                              int order,
                              int baudRate)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Set work parameters
        Parameters:
        mode - work mode,
        MODE0: CPOL=0,CPHA=0
        MODE1: CPOL=0,CPHA=1
        MODE2: CPOL=1,CPHA=0
        MODE3: CPOL=1,CPHA=1, default
        type - type mode,
        TYPE_SIO: single - I/O mode, default
        TYPE_DIO: two - I/O mode
        TYPE_QIO: four - I/O mode TYPE_PIO: parallel - I/O mode
        order - bit order mode,
        ORDER_MSB: high bit first transmission, default
        ORDER_LSB: low bit first transmission
        baudRate - baud rate,
        1:1Mbps, default
        2:2Mbps
        3:3Mbps
        4:4Mbps
        ...:...
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs

      • write

        public int write(byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Write the data to salve
        Parameters:
        data - data array
        offset - data offset
        len - data length
        Returns:
        write length
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs

        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range
